QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when backup_retention_period >= 7 then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when backup_retention_period >= 7 then title || ' automated backups enabled.'
    else title || ' automated backups disabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_neptune_db_cluster;
